about_the_game:
Welcome to Whisker's Wonderland!

Embark on a chilling adventure through the dilapidated halls of Whisker's Restaurant, a long-forgotten establishment where horrors lurk and secrets await discovery.

Exploring the Restaurant:

Enter the eerie ambiance of Whisker's Restaurant, where every creaking floorboard and flickering light hints at the sinister history that haunts its halls. Traverse through the abandoned dining areas, navigate the decaying kitchens, and brave the unsettling atmosphere that pervades every corner of this forgotten locale. But tread carefully, for beyond the public spaces lies the forbidden domain of the animatronic workers' lair, a place shrouded in mystery and dread.

Escaping Whiskers:

Beware the enigmatic presence of Whiskers, the sarcastic and cunning proprietor of Whisker's Restaurant. Concealing his true intentions behind a facade of hospitality, Whiskers manipulates you, leading you deeper into the darkness. Solve sinister puzzles, confront your deepest fears, and uncover the truth behind his dark past. Can you escape Whiskers' grasp and survive the horrors that await you?

What Happened to Doctor Mouser?:

Delve into the mystery surrounding the destruction of Doctor Mouser, Whisker's Stage partner who once brought joy to Whisker's Restaurant. Uncover the chilling tale of Doctor Mouser's demise as you sift through the remnants of his creations scattered throughout the restaurant's twisted corridors. Was it an act of sabotage, or did Doctor Mouser uncover something far more sinister lurking within the shadows of Whisker's Wonderland?

Finding What Pops Lost:

Join Jhon Lostheart's terrifying quest to recover what his father, a mysterious figure, lost within the forsaken halls of Whisker's Restaurant. Assist Jhon in navigating the restaurant's labyrinthine passages, braving the horrors that lurk around every corner, and overcoming the terrors that stand between him and the truth. But beware, for the journey through Whisker's Restaurant is fraught with unspeakable dread, and Jhon will need your courage to face the darkness that threatens to consume him.

Embark on a harrowing journey through Whisker's Restaurant, where horror, Robots, and mystery converge to create an experience that will haunt you long after the lights go out. Will you have the courage to uncover the secrets hidden within, or will you become lost in the darkness forever? The choice is yours. Welcome to Whisker's Wonderland!

name: Whiskers Wonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Winodws 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: **Whiskers Wonderland™** is a horror adventure in a decaying hot dog joint with a dark past. Play as *John Lostheart* to uncover family secrets while evading *Mr. Whiskers*, a twisted animatronic cat, and searching for his missing sidekick, *Dr. Mouser*. Explore, dodge traps, and survive—if you can.
